docs.lead_paragraph: The Masters group of Rory McIlroy, Jordan Spieth and Patrick Reed leads a new wave of players who have never seen a tournament field they didn’t think they could dominate.
docs.abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column; Masters group of Rory McIlroy, Jordan Spieth and Patrick Reed are at the vanguard of golf’s new wave of players who have never seen a tournament field they did not think they could dominate; all three wear their aggressiveness like a sponsor’s patch on their sleeves.

headline.main: Three Aggressive Young Golf Stars Are More Old School Than Not
headline.print_headline: Breaking From Past While Calling History to Mind
